short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the top sites in a browser action

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a browser extension that shows you your most visited web page on your browser that can help you to find the last visiting Top website you are visiting. Just click on a page to open it.
